<h1 align="center">
  Mee's personal website
</h1>

Built with: Gatsby, React, Styled Components, and Netlify CMS.

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Clone and Install**

    ```sh
    $ git clone https://github.com/meechanism/meechanism.git
    $ npm i
    ```

1.  **Start developing.**

    Navigate into your cloned repo and run:

    ```sh
    $ npm start
    ```

## Deployment

This repo is setup to auto deploy from master branch with Netlify.
